Class Parallelogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes
      • TwoDimensionalShape
        • Polygons
          • Quadrilaterals
            • Parallelogram
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rectangle, Rhombus

    public class Parallelogram
extends Quadrilaterals
    Class for Parallelogram. It extends from Quadrilaterals as parallelogram's share multiple methods with quadrilaterals.
    Author:
    Kyle Dorcey

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parallelogram

        public Parallelogram(java.lang.String shapeName,
                     double base,
                     double height,
                     double base2,
                     double height2)
        Class constructor for parallelogram. Passes shapeName, base, height, base2, and height2 to the parent class.
        Parameters:
        shapeName - String containing the name of the shape.
        base - Double representing the length of the base.
        height - Double representing the height of the parallelogram
        base2 - Double representing the length of the side opposite of base
        height2 - Double representing the length of the side opposite of "height"

    • Method Detail

      • setArea

        private static double setArea(double base,
                              double height)
        Finds the area of a parallelogram. The method is static as it is called during class construction.
        Parameters:
        base - Length of the base
        height - Length of the height
        Returns:
        Returns the area as a double

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Returns:
        returns the area as a double
